column3: aber a ɔhen Hezekia tsee no
column5: na ɔdze eyitam kataa no do
column6: na osii mu kɔr EWURADZE ne fie."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa Eliakim a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no
column4: na asɔfo no mu mpanyin no
column5: a nna wɔdze eyitam akatakata hɔn do no
column6: ma wɔkɔr Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia nkyɛn."
na ebufuw da: osiandɛ mbaa edu akoe mu
column7: na ahoɔdzen nnyi hɔ a wɔdze bɔwo."

column2: "Annyɛ a w’EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bɛtse Rabsake a no wura Asiriahen no asoma no dɛ ɔmbɔsopa tseasefo Nyankopɔn no
column4: na ɔaka n’enyim wɔ nsɛm a w’EWURADZE Nyankopɔn atse no ntsi: dɛm ntsi ma wo mpaabɔ do ma nkaa a wɔaka no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Hezekia no nkowaa no baa Isaia nkyɛn."

column3: Mbrɛ hom nka nkyerɛ hom wura nye yi
column5: Mma nnsuro asɛm a atse no a Asiriahen no nkowaa dze abɛyeyaw me no."

column3: medze sunsum bi mebɛhyɛ no mu
column5: na ɔasan akɔ nankasa n’asaase do; na mebɛma ɔatɔ wɔ afona ano wɔ nankasa n’asaase do."

column3: na okohun dɛ Asiriahen reyɛ Libna do sa: osiandɛ ɔatse dɛ oetu efi Lakis."

column2: "Na aber a ɔtsee dɛ wɔreka no wɔ Etiopiahen Tirhaka ho dɛ
column4: oefir edzi dɛ ɔnye wo robɔko no: ɔsomaa abɔfo bio ma wɔkɔr Hezekia nkyɛn
column7: "Mbrɛ hom nkɛka nkyerɛ Judahen Hezekia nye yi
column9: Mma mma wo Nyankopɔn a edze wo werɛ etwer no no nndaadaa wo

column3: ɔwoara atse dza Asiria ahemfo dze ayɛ asaase nyinara
column4: dɛ wɔasɛɛ hɔn pasapasa: na ɔwo na wɔbɛgye wo anaa?"

column7: na Eden mba a wɔwɔ Telasar no
column8: hɔn enyame no gyee hɔn anaa?"

column2: "Na Hezekia gyee nwoma no wɔ abɔfo no nsamu
column3: na ɔkenkanee: na Hezekia sii mu kɔr EWURADZE fie
column4: na ɔkɛtsɛɛw mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na Hezekia bɔɔ mpaa wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column6: ɔwo nkotoo ara nye asaase do ahendzi nyinara do Nyankopɔn; ɔwo na ayɛ ɔsor na asaase."
na hwɛ; na tsie Senakerib ne nsɛm a ɔdze asoma dɛ wɔmfa mbɔsopa tseasefo Nyankopɔn no."

column5: Asiria ahemfo asɛɛ amanaman na hɔn asaase
column7: "na wɔatotow hɔn enyame egu ogya mu: osiandɛ wɔnnyɛ enyame
column9: dua na abo; dɛm ntsi na wɔasɛɛ hɔn."

column6: ma asaase do ahenman nyinara nhu dɛ ɔwo nye EWURADZE Nyankopɔn

column2: "Nna Amoz ne ba Isaia somae ma wɔkɔr Hezekia nkyɛn dɛ
column5: Susuampa dɛ abɔ me mpaa wɔ Asiriahen Senakerib ho ntsi

column2: "Iyi nye asɛm a EWURADZE aka wɔ no ho: Ɔbaabun Zion babaa no ebu wo enyimtsia esi wo atwetwe; na Jerusalɛm babaa no awosow ne tsir wɔ wo do."
"Woana na asopa no na ayeyaw no
column3: na woana do na ama wo ndze do na w’enyiwa do wɔ sor etsia no? Ana nnyɛ Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no bi a?"

column4: Medze me ntseaseanam dodow no mobɔfow na maba mbepɔw etsifi
column5: makɔ Lebanon mu nohonoho ara; na mubotwitwa ne nkyindur atsentsen
column6: na no kupresi ndua a wɔapa no megu: na makɛhɛn n’etsiwatsiwa mu asoɛe

column2: "Emi na metutu mbura na manom amanandze nsu
column3: na medze m’ananadze awew Egypt esutsen nyinara."
na mifi tsetseberdo na mehyehyɛe? Afei na mebɛma aba mu dɛ
column4: ɔwo esɛɛ nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban na ema wɔdandan ekurofo ekuwekuw."

column2: "Na ɔnam dɛ ekuromfo no hɔn tum suar ntsi
column3: hɔn akoma tui na hɔn enyim guu ase; wɔtse dɛ haban mu efuw
column6: na eburow a ɔahyew ansaana orutu mpon."

column5: na wo dam a ebɔ wɔ mo do no."

column2: "Osian wo dam a ebɔ wɔ mo do
column3: na w’enyimenamsɛm a afow ebodu m’asomu ntsi
column4: medze nkwaba mebɛhyɛ wo hwen mu
column6: na mebɛsan wo ekyir afa ɔkwan a enam do bae noara do."

column2: "Na iyi bɛyɛ wo asɛnkyerɛdze: afe yi mu hom bedzi dza noara efifir
column3: na afe a otsia ebien no mu dza obefir noara mu epue; na afe a otsia ebiasa no mu no hom ndua

column2: "Na Juda ofi mu nkaa a woefi nsa no wɔbɛgye ndwow akɔ famu bio
"Osiandɛ Jerusalɛm ne nkaase bi befir edzi efi
column3: na hɔn a wobefi nsa so efi bepɔw Zion do; EWURADZE no mbɔdzembɔ na ɔbɛyɛ iyi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE ka no wɔ Asiriahen ho nye yi
column4: na ɔronntow hɔ egyen menaba so
column5: nkyii so ɔremmfa kyɛm mmba n’enyim
column6: na eso ɔronnhɔr pempe wɔ no do."

column3: ɔnoara so na ɔnam do bɛsan akɔ

column2: "Na mebɛper kurow yi na magye no nkwa

column3: EWURADZE no bɔfoe fiir edzi kokunkum Asiriafo nseraban do nyimpa mpemɔha eduowɔtwe enum: na aber a nyimpa soɛɛr anapaatu no
aber a ɔrosɔr wɔ ne nyame Nisrok fie no
column4: nna ne mba Adrammelek na Sarezer dze afona kum no: na wofii nsa guanee kɔr Ararat asaase do. Na ne babanyin Esar-haddon dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
